brainly_data.question:
PLEASEEE HELP 

Study the style of Helen Keller's autobiography. Compare it to the organization patterns detailed in the lesson "Autobiographies." Then, choose two patterns from the list below and write two paragraph-long journal entries using one of each. You may write your journal entries based on today or another day you remember clearly. Remember, you goal is two part. First, tell what happened and how it affected your outlook. Second, convince the reader that your outlook is worth knowing about or sharing. 

Choose two of these patterns: Time-Order
Cause-Effect 
Compare-Contrast 
Part-Whole

Remember to label each paragraph with the pattern type you have chosen. Use your best spelling, mechanics, and grammar.
brainly_data.subject: English

all_answers.text: Only you can do this project, it is about your day. If you hand it in with someone else's day entry you will just confuse your teacher.
